author: Snazzy Labs
description:
The Light Phone and Minimal Phone are all the rage—but they aren’t gonna do crap for you…

The modern smartphone has transformed daily life, driving unprecedented connectivity, productivity, and instant access to information, but also fueling smartphone addiction, digital distractions, and notification overload. Minimalist phones and single-purpose devices like the Light Phone III and Minimal Phone promise digital minimalism, but often can’t fully replace the essential features and convenience of iOS and Android smartphones. Leveraging iOS Focus Modes, smarter notification management, and dedicated gadgets for tasks like reading (hello, Kindle) or time management (
title: Do NOT Buy a “Minimalist” Phone!!
